snippet: Miguel De Los Santos received 25 years to life in the death of Manuel Gonzalez, who was killed while armed men were trying to pry information about a relative out of him.
abstract: Justice Ruth Pickholz sentences Miguel De Los Santos to 25 years to life in prison for the 1999 torture and murder of Manuel Gonzalez; four other men involved in crime were convicted, but De Los Santos evaded capture for years.
lead_paragraph: Miguel De Los Santos received 25 years to life in the death of Manuel Gonzalez, who was killed while armed men were trying to pry information about a relative out of him.

headline.main: Judge Sentences Drug Dealer in ’99 Manhattan Murder
headline.print_headline: Judge Sentences Drug Dealer in ’99 Murder
